title: I've Wandered Far Away (Lord, I'm Coming Home)

author.name: William J. Kirkpatrick
author.bio: American hymn‑writer and composer who produced hundreds of gospel songs in the late‑19th and early‑20th centuries.

lyrics:
1. I've wandered
Far away from God,
Now I'm coming home;
The paths of sin
Too long I've trod,
Lord, I'm coming home.

CHORUS:
Coming home,
Coming home,
Never more to roam;
Open wide Thine arms of love—
Lord, I'm coming home.

2. I've wasted many
Precious years,
Now I'm coming home;
I now repent
With bitter tears,
Lord, I'm coming home.

3. I'm tired of sin
And straying, Lord,
Now I'm coming home;
I'll trust Thy love,
Believe Thy word,
Lord, I'm coming home.

4. My soul is sick,
My heart is sore,
Now I'm coming home;
My strength renew,
My hope restore,
Lord, I'm coming home.
